column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4956_890c42a4e1ac1ea336c51e9b83488247452aa07d/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te

'multi-machine code that needs to operate across the internet' is one clause, please don't break it with a comma
Also splitting the "If..." off looks strange here as it raises the expectation that something will follow.
Just keep this sentence as-is.
